# Set Up
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(fixest)
library(readxl)
```

# Load Dataset
```{r}
data_1 <- read_xlsx('/Users/nicholas/Desktop/Cal_Poly_SLO/5-World_Bank/Data/merged_data/appended_df.xlsx')
```

# Simple Linear Regression
```{r}
mod1 <- lm(disposable_income~greenwheel_dummy, data = data_1)
summary(mod1)
```

# Linear Regression With Controls
```{r}
mod2 <- lm(disposable_income~age+ dep + leisure+ factor(greenwheel_dummy) + factor(educ) + factor(acc_med) + factor(insure), data = data_1)
summary(mod2)
```
